game.name: Moving Out
game.categories: Single-player, Multi-player, Co-op, Shared/Split Screen Co-op, Shared/Split Screen, Steam Achievements, Full controller support, Adjustable Text Size, Camera Comfort, Color Alternatives, Custom Volume Controls, Adjustable Difficulty, Playable without Timed Input, Subtitle Options, Steam Cloud, Remote Play on Phone, Remote Play on Tablet, Remote Play on TV, Remote Play Together, Family Sharing
game.shortDescription: Moving Out은 즐거운 물리 기반 이삿짐 운반 시뮬레이터로 "카우치 코옵" 장르에 새로운 바람을 몰고 올 겁니다! 이삿짐 운반 회사에서 일을 시작할 준비는 되셨나요? 여러분은 새롭게 검증된 가구 정리 및 재배치 기술자로서, Packmore라는 도시 전역에서 이삿짐 운반 업무를 맡습니다.
game.shortDescriptionEn: Moving Out is a ridiculous physics-based moving simulator that brings new meaning to "couch co-op"! Are you ready for an exciting career in furniture? As a newly certified Furniture Arrangement & Relocation Technician, you’ll take on moving jobs all across the busy town of Packmore.

reviewHighlights.text: very cool game ngl. This game made me and my girlfriend wishing death uppon a game because we can't move a single inch without breaking a window. 10/1...
I play solo, so I bought this game only because of the Steam sale. Cutesy environments, challenging levels and stress-free button smashing gameplay. P...
